about_the_game:
Willie's Nightfall is a first-person horror game. Explore the eerie offices of Willie's Company in search of secret documents. But you're not alone. The sinister company mascot, Willie—a distorted, murderous mouse—is hunting you down.

GAMEPLAY


As you explore, you'll need to solve puzzles, find keys and access cards to unlock restricted areas. These areas may hold the secret documents you’re searching for—files that reveal the truth about the creation of Willie.

Willie is aware of your presence, and his twisted grin hides a malevolent intent. He stalks the darkened corridors, listening for every sound you make. You'll need to stay sharp, move cautiously, and use the environment to your advantage to avoid his relentless pursuit.
The flickering lights, the creaking doors, or his sickly whistling all warn of Willie’s approach. Stay vigilant and don't get caught by the murderous mouse.

KEY FEATURES

  • Puzzles - Solve challenges involving keys, passwords, and access cards to unlock restricted areas and uncover secrets
  • Stealth - Hide behind objects and stay alert to sounds
  • Replayability - Enjoy a fresh experience each time you play, with keys, passwords, documents, and other items randomly placed in different locations
  • AI - he’s always in a different place and can access any room by opening doors, making each encounter unpredictable and tense

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 - 64bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 or new-gen i3 / AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI HD7900 series or NVIDIA equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 - 64bit
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
